sqlMap.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from sbbs where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.*from ( select boardNum,name,subject,hitCount, to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created from sbbs where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' order by boardNum desc) data)
where rnum>=#start# and rnum<=#end#
sqlMap.update: update sbbs set hitCount=hitCount+1 where boardNum=#boardNum#
sqlMap.select: select boardNum,name,pwd,email,subject,content,ipAddr, hitCount,created from sbbs where boardNum=#boardNum#

select data.* from ( select boardNum,subject from sbbs where ($searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%') and
(boardNum>#boardNum#) order by boardNum asc) data where rownum = 1

select data.* from ( select boardNum,subject from sbbs where ($searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%') and
(boardNum<#boardNum#) order by boardNum desc) data where rownum = 1
sqlMap.update: update sbbs set name=#name#,subject=#subject#,email=#email#, content=#content#,pwd=#pwd# where boardNum=#boardNum#
